website_summaries.verdict: A state-of-the-art travel mug that has every convenient feature covered. Hands-down the best on the market today.
pros: Features vacuum insulation for hours of hot or cold beverages
Built-in tea hook makes brewing on the go a breeze
cons: The handle doesn't feel sturdy and is awkward to hold

customer_reviews.title: Very poor open/close lid design.
customer_reviews.text: Very complicated design they made which is so delicate that its nit supposed to be used. Very bad product. I own two and not satisfied with the poor design that fails in few week. And forget the cleaning, any wrong step in disassembly make the product useless like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Leakproof, great for people on the go!
customer_reviews.text: This traveling mug is amazing! I had one similar to it, which I lost, but it was not dishwasher safe. This one is and it helps to save time when you don't have to wash it by hand. (It saves you money too, from buying a cup of coffee on the go.) I can pour a hot cup of coffee from my coffee machine in this mug at 6:00 am in the morning and it will still be hot from 11:00 am to 1:00 pm, as if I just poured it in the mug. I can turn the whole mug upside down, shake it and it does not leak! I highly recommend this mug for people on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Relinda

customer_reviews.title: Lid breaks
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased 2 of these and liked them at first. One of the lids leaked and permitently locked. Being it had good reviews I thought it was a fluke. My second one did the same thing. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Super hot
customer_reviews.text: Do you like your coffee hot? Like scolding hot? Right off the boiling pot hot? Do you want your coffee to stay that hot all day long? Do you hate pouring your coffee into a mug to heat it back up? Then this is the thermos for you! Kept my coffee super hot all day! I didnt have my thermometer with me but I could say through a 12 hour work shift it maybe only dropped 1 or 2 degrees in temperature. This mug works better than my hydroflask mug and that was twice as expensive! As long as you don't mind maybe burning your self periodically throughout the day then this is the thermos for you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything "As Advertised"
customer_reviews.text: This is everything the description claims it is, and it's reasonably priced. It keeps coffee hot for hours. I leave it "open" so it isn't too hot to drink. And it fits under my single serve Mr. Coffee Keurig, and in my car's cup holder. There is not a problem with the lid. An opening doesn't need to be at "6 o'clock" for you to be able to drink out of it easily. And the open/close toggle has two different open positions so it doesn't have to touch your lips while drinking.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Not 16 ounces!
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as a 16 oz. cup. It's not. You can fit 16 ounces in it and even put the lid on but when you get in the car and take that first sip on your way to work you will find that 2 ounces made its way past the seal and has ended up on your white shirt and tie. Not a good look for the day. To keep from having issues, 14 ounces is the max if you don't want problems. Aside from that it's a good cup. Coffee stays hot all day.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverages hot BUT hard to open
customer_reviews.text: This cup will keep your beverage hot for hours. Unfortunately the lid has a smooth surface and is very hard to open unless you have strong hands. It would be nice if it had small nubs or something to keep your hand from slipping. Bottom line I would not recommend this cup for us older folks who may not have the hand strength to open it. Would give it more stars if they could figure out how to make it useable for anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Richard T Heidecker

customer_reviews.title: Buy it now! Best travel mug on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this mug. I honestly feel like love is an understatement. It works so well. It’s easy to clean, either by hand or dishwasher safe! You do have to arrange the top every so often to get the sipping part in the right spot. The no-leak lid is the best I’ve ever experienced. I think I may even buy another one as a back up!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my coffee HOT
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest go mug I've ever had! My coffee is hot all day until the last drop, even outdoors during winter golf. The tapered shape is such that the fingers on my cup holder aren't broken by it. Only drawbacks are that the vacuum seal is so tight that the top is difficult to unscrew by aged hands, and the internal parts are difficult to reassemble after cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Dudg

customer_reviews.title: Too Hard to Clean, and too easy too lose parts when you clean it.
customer_reviews.text: The mug did great in all aspects except for ease of cleaning. In order to ensure the lid components (about 8 pieces) are completely clean, you must disassemble the lid. I use cream in my coffee so it’s essential to clean thoroughly with each use. We’ve already lost one of the smaller pieces and now the lid won’t seal completely. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: EG

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job and does it well.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for use at the office and while traveling with Coffee. Does a great job, doesn't leak, haven't had any issues so far in several months. I could see over time if the lid isn't cleaned/maintained the seal my start to fail and could begin to leak if that happens. If that ever occurs for me and I can't just buy a replacement lid, I'd buy this again. Works well for tea bags if you wrap the string around the inside hook, the teabag will hang/steep into the water while you are on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Eyedol

customer_reviews.title: well made and easy to hold but....
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mug. I have been looking for one to replace an older Thermos model I had that they do not make any more. My only complaint about this mug is that the lip area is thick and is not as comfortable sipping as I would like. Thermos, if you are listening I want you to bring back the broad-based mug you used to make back in the mid-2000s era. A lot of people would like a mug to keep their coffee hot at home and not worry about knocking it over. Not everyone wants a travel mug.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Epler

customer_reviews.title: I still love it like a favorite pair of sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Everyone in my household has their very own mug, in choice of color. They keep your hot beverage hot for hours! I’ve had mine for four years, and while the finish/color is starting to wear off, I still love it like a favorite pair of sneakers! You get your moneys worth. I ordered a second one for my husband; he works in construction and his had seen four years of abuse. I replaced it this Christmas; Someone stole the new one. So I’m buying a third- he loves it that much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cheaply made, falling apart within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job of keeping contents hot and cold. Unfortunately, is extremely cheaply made considering how expensive it is. Within less than 2 months the open/close switch has stopped working and is now always open, and the handle has begun to fall apart. Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cup for my husband. He loves it. He doesn't have to hurry and drink his coffee or tea not before it gets cold. This cup is pretty nice and sturdy. I love how is was designed and my guess it will last a very long time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Bruster

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: The product keeps your coffee warm for hours as advertised. I particularly like the left hand - right hand feature with openings at 180 degrees for sipping. The thermos mug is also designed to minimize the risk of hot liquids being spilled or consumed too fast, with its slow releasing opening. The visible open-close labels on top are also very helpful. Now I always drink my morning coffee from th is vessel.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves
customer_reviews.text: Thermos is the only brand coffee mug my husband will use. We now have 4 of them. My daughter bought my husband one 10 years ago for a gift and that was it for him. He will not use any other kind. He takes it everywhere with him.
customer_reviews.author: Candy Allison

customer_reviews.title: it is fantastic. I fill mine up at 5
customer_reviews.text: As far as keeping liquids hot, it is fantastic. I fill mine up at 5:30 AM and the contents are still hot at noon. The best coffee mug I've ever owned. Also, it breaks down for easy cleaning and has an open/closed feature that really works. It has one flaw, which I did not discount in my score. The top is very difficult to open. If you are elderly, this could be a problem. The rubber ring used to seal the lid sticks. But if you are looking for a mug that will keep your items hot, or cold, this one is the top of the line.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Great features
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for a friend and he can't stop telling me all of the great features. Obviously I would recommend to a friend or family member.
customer_reviews.author: NEBuckATX

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Great gift, but hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Step Father. He loves it and uses it everyday. He works outside and it has withstood the heat and the cold. Only downside is that there are a lot of parts and pieces, so it is difficult to thoroughly clean it. So he switches off between this thermos and another one, so that this one can soak for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Zephyr Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Thermos stainless king 16 travel mug
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for camping and hunting trips to keep beer cold and hands warm. Works perfect. You do have to screw the lid on very tightly or it will leak. I know it was not designed for that, but that's what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Braddog

customer_reviews.title: Hot Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Truly keeps your coffee hot for hours. After trying 4 other brands (which did not work as advertised) went with the Thermos brand. It IS the best, hands down. I even have to put 1 or 2 ice cubes into it to be able to drink the coffee and it still stays hot for hours. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David P Vardo

customer_reviews.title: Best cup I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cup. I make my coffee at 630 am and at 1 pm it is still nice and warm. It puts every starbucks cup I've ever owned to shame. Will be buying a few more to replace all of what's in the cabinet!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: This thing works!
customer_reviews.text: No insulated mug I've ever owned keeps the content's temperature steady like this one. My only comment it that cleaning the removable top requieres disassembly. It takes a little getting used to and is an acceptable compromise for the excellent thermal properties of this mug.
customer_reviews.author: up and across

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed four hours and no temperature loss.
customer_reviews.text: I put hot water in it for 10 minutes and then put in my coffee in. I take my coffee with cream so it's already cool down before I put it into the thermos mug. I took a drink every hour on the hour and this kept my coffee for 4 hours and barely losing any heat. Into the 7th hour the coffee was warm but not cold. I recommend this for hot liquids I've not tried it with cold.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Clean, Tough Enough to Drop.
customer_reviews.text: My husband tends to break all his travel mugs from dropping them. That, or he is terrible at cleaning them out because his hands won't fit inside to clean it out. I'm sure happy we found this guy! It's steal with a handle so he never drops it but we did test it and it is unphased by dropping. He can also get his hand inside to clean but it still fits into the car drink carrier. It's absolutely perfect! Easy to use, easy to clean, keeps things hot. We're very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hot liquids HOT
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these Thermos mugs, but tend to lose them. I had my last one for almost 2 years...never gave me any reason to complain. I ice fish a LOT and will keep my coffee hot for hours, even when I leave the lid in the open position...remember to close it and it will keep it hot all day! My wife finally broke down and got one as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howe

customer_reviews.title: Too efficient!
customer_reviews.text: Works exceedingly well! I'm going to need to start letting my coffee cool *before* filling this cup if I want to be able to drink it. Update 2018-09-03: The biggest weakness for me is the fact that the lid doesn't come apart further. There's a seal around the stem that moves the seal plate, and it is nearly impossible to keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: Richard M. Hungerford

customer_reviews.title: Love these cups
customer_reviews.text: Love these cups. I’m on my 2nd one because I may drop them now and then. You can leave hot coffee in them and pick it up hours later and it’s still warm. Don’t pay $$$ for that other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Debekus

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Mug
customer_reviews.text: I like my coffee luke warm, yeah, I know it's weird. But this keeps my coffee luke warm for days, amazing. And I love the handle so I can hook it to my backpack, or quickly throw it in my pocket for two free hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Expensive crap
customer_reviews.text: Poured hot coffee all over me several times. Very difficult to clean the lid.
customer_reviews.author: j digital

customer_reviews.title: Amazon reneged on their agreement to extend a $10 credit.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like Amazon reneging on their $10 credit agreement because the first order of this product turned out defective at 91 days.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Keep coffee hot for a long time
customer_reviews.text: I have this for awhile now and use it everyday. This mug is by far my best one. I love it when you remove the lid, there is not plastic right attach to the top like other. This is great for not having coffee stuck in between the plastic and actual mug. This mug keep my coffee at drinkable temperature for more than 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Toan

customer_reviews.title: Great mug!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband because I saw it in a grocery store for $30 and waited until his Starbucks one was on its last leg to buy this one. He loves it to say the least. It keeps the coffee hot for almost 6 hours even though it says 4. He gets compliments on it daily because of the look and most importantly it can take a hit if accidently dropped. Obviously I recommend hand washing it as per the manufacturer instructions and it will last a long time. I would recommend to anyone who wants to keep their coffee hot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley B

customer_reviews.title: Made my Coffee Taste Like Metal :(
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended, however, I just could never get the metally taste out of it. I would go with a Yeti. Yes, they cost more, but you're really not breaking the bank if you buy one of their $35 offerings that are bigger and do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my coffee hot!
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it for about a week but so far, so good. I keeps my coffee very hot. I feel like it’s hotter in the mug than it was in the coffee pot. The open/close is easy to use. It fits in the cup holder in my car perfectly too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina K.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Hope the handle doesn't get loose like other reviewers said. When I first receipt the cup, I thought it was defective because when I twist to close the lid, the openings (the holes that you drink water) did not stop at the next to the handle. Then I realize you've to twist it tight enough till it stop at the right place. I have a cup like this without the handle. That one I'm still using it, but the cup makes stuttering noises when the nob is at the closed position.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Z

customer_reviews.title: Best Coffee Thermos Ever
customer_reviews.text: Best Thermos/coffee cup I have ever owned! I wasn't wanting to spend this much on a coffee cup, but I use it everyday. I make coffee before I go to the gym every morning, and then drink it when I get to work after. Basically at 3 hours after I make it, the coffee is still scalding hot. Sometimes even up to 5 hours after the coffee is as hot as when I poured it. The seal is great and never spills. The 16oz capacity is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Carrinton

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep coffee hot
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. I didn't keep my coffee hot. I pour very hot coffee in the cup at about 5am and coffe was cold by 9am when I had my breakfast. One plus is that it is spill proof. But if you do not intend to drink you coffee or tea on the way to work, this will not work for you
customer_reviews.author: debie cameron

customer_reviews.title: Leave the lid off for a bit so water will cool some. This has been perfect for my fast ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT put boiling water in here because it really does hold the heat for hours. Leave the lid off for a bit so water will cool some. This has been perfect for my fast paced job where I don’t have time to leave my post to reheat beverages.
customer_reviews.author: AM Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Great travel mug
customer_reviews.text: I like my tea HOT.I leave my home at 4:30AM to commute over an hour to work. The tea I've placed in this mug is still plenty hot two hours later. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: 3tech

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first two uses
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first two uses. Now the little knob that indicates open/close is broken. Half the time the cup indicates closed and its open and vice versa. I would return the cup if it was an option still,
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for dad in 60s.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my father. He uses it all day long everyday for his black coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding insulation, poor paint finish.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used this one yet. Already have a red one. Keeps things hot or cold for a long long time! Giving it 4 stars because the finish wears off with use - ie, where it fits in the cupholder now has a steel colored ring where paint has come off. That being said, I did purchase this second one because nothing beats the insulation quality. If appearance is not a big concern, this is the best on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Oldhide

customer_reviews.title: After 3 months Leaks BAD.
customer_reviews.text: Cant stop from leaking. Keeps coffee hot, but after 3 months will not stop leaking. Took apart and thoroughly cleaned several times. Will stop leaking for a few sips, then will start leaking again. Sometimes a steady stream of hot coffee pours all over my shirt and pants. Paid $30.00. That works out to $10.00 per month. I'll stick with paper cups.
customer_reviews.author: L. W.

customer_reviews.title: The handle makes it easier to drink from.
customer_reviews.text: When I go for my weekly walk with a meetup group, I take it with me filled with coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually works TOO good
customer_reviews.text: Keeps drinks hot for HOURS. The stated hours are indeed accurate. Which is almost a fault because unless you take the lid off your drink will never get cold enough to enjoy without scalding your lips and tongue. In fact i think liquids somehow actually get hotter in this mug because coffee in this seems way hotter than in any other mug i have drank from. On my way to work i usually leave the lid off for 15 mins before i start sipping.
customer_reviews.author: Joe's Indifference

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee hot, it’s leak proof and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best travel cup
customer_reviews.text: Best travel cup I have ever had!! Fits in the car cup holder and with the handle it’s so easy to hold while driving.
customer_reviews.author: linda rout

customer_reviews.title: Keeps his coffee hot for at least a good 3 hours in the mornings
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd mug of this kind that I've bought for my husband. He ran over the first one so I bought a second one and after many years left it in someone's car. Keeps his coffee hot for at least a good 3 hours in the mornings, even in the cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: I expected more from a brand like Thermos. There's just too much of a pronounced ...
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from a brand like Thermos. There's just too much of a pronounced metallic taste in this mug...I've been using stainless mugs for decades and this is the first one that has that taste. Not awful, but distracting enough.
customer_reviews.author: IK

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cup for hot drinks! Holds the temperature very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee tumbler I have yet to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the handle for always having a place to hook it onto when my hands are full and of course the trusted thermos design that keeps my coffee hot for the whole day. It doesn't hold very well in my bike water bottle holder but I was able to slide on an inexpensive silicone sleeve to solve that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Stephens

customer_reviews.title: defective product
customer_reviews.text: The lid on the item has become defective after only 7 months of CASUAL use. I thought this was supposed to be a high end product!!!
customer_reviews.author: LuisV

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for years so I got it for my daughter and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mug is great until you have to clean it
customer_reviews.text: This mug is great until you have to clean it. The lid comes apart to clean it thoroughly but is impossible to put back together. It leaks no matter what way you do it. I am going to return item. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cosmo D. Donato

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Even with the top off it will keep ice overnight.
customer_reviews.author: bill r.

customer_reviews.title: Still hot, Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cup to keep my tea hot. I have a habit of letting it sit around for a while. Thermos says, it keeps things hot for 7 hours. I like to use boiling water to soak my tea bags and have found out the hard way to let it sit for a few minutes with the lid off before sealing it up, because 12 hours later it was still DAM HOT! I now just move the valve to open and it stays hot for hours at a pleasantly enjoyable temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel mug
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Very attractive, heavier weight, holds a lot and keeps coffee piping hot for hours. Fits well in cup holder, easy to clean. 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S

customer_reviews.title: Drink stays hot....maybe too hot!
customer_reviews.text: Drink stays warm for hours! Durable mug and holds a large volume. Great buy as a gift! My dad as an avid coffee drinker, who needs it to stay piping hot, loved it! I purchased one for myself(w/o handle) from another retailer and I can attest to its ability to staying warm. Almost to the point where my drink feels hotter than it was when I poured it in.
customer_reviews.author: Becka

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Love how it keeps my coffee hot!
customer_reviews.author: Kody

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverage hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Awesome purchase. It has a hook on the under side of the lid to hanging your teabags. It keeps your beverage hot for hours.
customer_reviews.author: The Deb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquids warm or cool.. Does the job... Impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Travel mug keeps my coffee warm for almost about 6-7 hours. I am impressed about the feature. Easy to clean. Although, having put the mug in the dishwasher twice now has had the mug handle seam come a little lose. This hasn't compromised the mug so far nor its ability to maintain heat or cold. Mug fits the cup holder in the car and outsides can be scratched if not maintained well. Will definitely recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Al B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty gall durn good
customer_reviews.text: Uh. Maze. Ing. My boss (wife) tells me this is the best she's ever had over a bazillion years of travel mugs. OK. So she's not that old, but we do get a lot of mailings from Social Security.
customer_reviews.author: Sourkraut

customer_reviews.title: Keeps liquid warm forever!
customer_reviews.text: Has leaked between bottom of lid and top of cup, where it screws in. Once you figure out a tightening sequence, problem is solved.
customer_reviews.author: dan callahan

customer_reviews.title: 5 STARRSSSS!
customer_reviews.text: I take coffee to work every day and this cup is the best! It fits the best in my car cup holder and it is easy to carry and you definitely DONT have to worry about it leaking!! It is wonderful would definitely purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: lydia

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband and then for my father in law. Neither one leaves the house without it full of coffee in the morning. Keeps coffee hot for hours, even while hunting outdoors in Wisconsin! Thermos definitely makes a high quality product. We put ours in the dishwasher without any problems months down the road.
customer_reviews.author: nic286

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Travel Mug
customer_reviews.text: Hefty, well-constructed, double walled, vacuum sealed, 16-ounce coffee mug. Filled it with hot coffee, closed it, and carefully as an experiment turned it upside down and shook it hard. Not a drip! This is a wonderful travel mug, and actually holds a full 16 ounces, unlike the Contigo Autoseal, which calls itself a 16-ounce mug but barely holds 12 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Crilly Butler

customer_reviews.title: You can buy a thermos or you can buy a "Thermos"
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for Christmas for someone and they use it everyday. Thermos brand naturally lives up to to the expectation.
customer_reviews.author: PrestonSquyres

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and keeps coffee warm all day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He likes the look, but, it’s hard to clean and wished it came with an extra silicone seal. It is keeps his coffee warm all day.
customer_reviews.author: mjghound

customer_reviews.title: Hand wash only.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set. I now have four of these and four of the ones with no handle. When you close the lid, you can hold it upside down and nothing comes out. However, hand wash only. After a few times in the dishwasher, the paint starts coming off. Also, you drop it, you've scratched it.
customer_reviews.author: b-law

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says and keeps my coffee hot for hours. I use this mug for only one thing, coffee - - I have one mug of coffee per day, sometimes I get busy and forget to take sips, so often times, at noon, I will be drinking the coffee I poured at 5 am. By that time, there may only be a few sips left but it's still very warm (not as hot as fresh poured, but always surprisingly very warm still) and fresh tasting! Wish they'd make a 20 ounce one.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Keeps coffee hot for hours
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Keeps coffee hot for hours. Down side is you have to take the lid apart every time to keep it clean. The parts in the lid keep gunk. Gets gross fast
customer_reviews.author: Jon T.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, my stepdad hasn't managed to scrape it ...
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, my stepdad hasn't managed to scrape it yet and he is very rough on it. Had this almost a year now and still no scratches. Keeps things hot all day.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Keeps My Coffee Hot
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job keeping hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold.
customer_reviews.author: BD46

customer_reviews.title: Great mug.
customer_reviews.text: Best coffee mug I ever owned. I like hot coffee, this mug keeps it hot for hours. I decided I'm going to buy another one for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Works great, great design
customer_reviews.text: Best mug I have ever bought my wife. We have used Yeti and similar products, but the vaccuum seal lid on this one is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: James Smogonovich

customer_reviews.title: Keeps beverage hot
customer_reviews.text: This cup will keep a beverage hot all day. I have left it in my car all day in the winter & my tea was still very warm at 4pm. It is a bit heavy, but worth it for the insulation.
customer_reviews.author: SWJ

customer_reviews.title: Best vacuum coffee mug
customer_reviews.text: My favorite coffee mug! Keeps coffee hot for hours, even in the coldest weather. Everything about it works wonderfully. This was well designed and seems very well engineered. As long as the thumb spout opener/closer lasts, I could see this lasting for many years.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hutson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I drink coffee every morning. It was a bit expensive but it does keep everything very hot for 3-4+ hours. The locking system works great, I turned it upside down to test it and nothing came out. I also bought one for my Mom for Christmas because she's a big coffee drinker too and her coffee is always getting cold.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Temperatures, Seal Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Kept my latte piping hot for more than an hour WITH THE LID OFF. Great for keeping your drink hot, easy to carry. Lid mechanism may eventually be hard to clean but I have not had the item long. EDIT: Amended this review. Coffee leaks through the seal on 3rd use. Never put in dishwasher, washed all components thoroughly and promptly after use as recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Raney

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drinks hot a long time
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee hot for many hours. Top seals very well. The only drawback is that the top has to be aligned just right to have the holes in the right place. When it is aligned where the cover doesn’t leak it is very hard to open again. If you rotate it back 180 degrees to the other hole the cover is too loose. Not a big problem but could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Power Runner

customer_reviews.title: It is a good product very hermetic
customer_reviews.text: It is a good product very hermetic, but you have some problems when you put something hot inside, the internal mechanism has problems to open again. I will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jack!

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee hot for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Love these mugs. We use them for coffee when we travel. They keep our coffee hot for 8 hours. Love love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how long it keeps my coffee hot.
customer_reviews.text: Can't believe how long it keeps my coffee hot. Only problem is it leaks if you turn it on it's side
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Great cup, but don't pull the rubber gasket to ...
customer_reviews.text: The hot sure does stay hot, but you can't wash it. I followed the directions for washing, and now I can't get the cup to stop leaking. I have tried and tried to get that rubber seal to go back in place, but no matter what I do, it leaks. I may get it to stop for a couple of hours, but the next refill, it's leaking again. Great cup, but don't pull the rubber gasket to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven H.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my drinks hot or cold
customer_reviews.text: Very effective in keeping drinks hot or cold. Also it seals very effectively when in closed position. Only disadvantage is that it is rather heavy .
customer_reviews.author: William Schwanekamp

customer_reviews.title: Wont be disappointed with this mug
customer_reviews.text: Will keep your coffee hot for hours or pop cold. Deff buy another
customer_reviews.author: Jason thomas

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Keeps hot drinks hot and cold drinks cold for hours. Occasionally you’ll get one with a lid that’s faulty- that doesn’t align when turned to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are an avid coffee drinker like me... you NEED this cup. It holds your drink hot for what it seems like forever! You will find this mug becoming your very best friend in no time. Easy to clean, no dishwasher necessary. The shape and handle are well designed. This is my go -to travel mug for every day!
customer_reviews.author: Aandjsmom3

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome mugs. I have two of these and so ...
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome mugs. I have two of these and so does my wife. I never had anything go wrong with them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Use them happily every day!!
customer_reviews.text: Hot or cold drinks remain the exact temperature for hours. This has become one of my favorite everyday items and I am grateful for this small but decadent luxury. I bring my special blend of coffee and tea to work everyday and it's like carrying a bit of home with me everywhere I go. I use them constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Zenhip

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that we have bought. Great for keeping coffee hot for many hours. Great for a left handed person.
customer_reviews.author: Smith

customer_reviews.title: Keeps warm all day
customer_reviews.text: My husband takes it for work and loves it. Keeps coffee warm for hours
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Bradbury

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift for my husband, and he ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband, and he likes it. It keeps his coffee hot when he is on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Eltje Lenz

customer_reviews.title: Best Mug Ever
customer_reviews.text: There is no better mug! I have tried them all, it does what is says it will do. Does not leak keeps everything hot for over 4hrs plus and cold as well. I have two these now, left my first one at relatives at Thanksgiving and could not live without one so I bought another and got my old one back at Christmas :-)
customer_reviews.author: M. Campisi

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: great cup, keeps warm for hours. does not leak, easy care, stylish
customer_reviews.author: Spant002

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 3 days.....
customer_reviews.text: The air lock mechanism broke after 3 days.... would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: StephMargaret

customer_reviews.title: He had to let it cool down so that he could hold it with 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my father. He is 94 and loves very hot coffee. I sat with him on his couch one day and watched as he struggled to get a regular cup to his mouth. He had to let it cool down so that he could hold it with 2 hands. Then he wanted it heated up again. With this he can easily hold it and he doesn't spill anything. It does stay hot, too. He hasn't spilled any coffee in my car, either!
customer_reviews.author: Harvey B

customer_reviews.title: That is leak proof
customer_reviews.text: I love my thermo!!!!! It keeps my coffee hot, Its easy to hold, liquid proof, the design is very pretty, very elegant ( I always get compliments from everyone). I also bought one for my friend and she LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Thermos Stainless King 16 Ounce Travel Mug with Handle, Matte Black
product_meta.description: An ideal choice for people on the go, the Stainless King Vacuum Insulated Travel Mug is built to last and loaded with features to make for a more enjoyable drinking experience. Thermos vacuum insulation technology virtually eliminates temperature change within the beverage container by creating an airless space between two stainless steel walls. The result is an insulation layer that performs better than any other. A superior insulated container you can depend on to keep your beverages hotter, colder, fresher, longer. This travel mug keeps beverages hot for 5 hours or cold for 9, making it a great choice for long days out and about or in the office. Constructed with double wall stainless steel, this 16 ounce travel mug is virtually durable, yet its sleek design is both eye-catching and functional. The contoured body shape is easy to grip and fits most automobile cup holders and is single serve compatible. For tea drinkers, a built-in tea hook is just the ticket to brew tea on the go. The tea hook can also accommodate most loose leaf infusers. The Stainless King Travel Mug comes equipped with a 100% leak-proof Drink Lock sealing lid which operates simply by pushing the lever 45 degrees right or left to open and close. And because of the double wall insulation, the stainless steel body stays cool to the touch with hot beverages and condensation-free with cold beverages. In order to maximize the incredible insulation technology, it is recommended to either pre-chill or pre-heat the travel mug just prior to use. This can be accomplished by filling the mug with cold or hot tap water, attaching the lid and letting it rest for a few minutes. Before you are ready to use, simply empty the water and fill with your favorite beverage. The Stainless King Vacuum Insulated Travel Mug is made of BPA-free materials and is backed by a five-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: Thermos vacuum insulation technology for maximum temperature retention, hot or cold, keeps liquids hot for 5 hours and cold for 9 hours
Durable stainless steel interior and exterior
Cool to the touch with hot liquids, sweat proof with cold
Built in tea hook, easily holds tea bags or most loose leaf infusers
Fits most automobile cup holders; single serve compatible

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
